rules_text: Signature – [i](Put your chosen signature into your hand from outside the game when you control two of its named cards.)[/i]
special_text:
Team [i](Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.)[/i]
[+1]: Put a loyalty counter on Laura, True Friend for each creature in your sentai. [i](A sentai is up to one creature of each color.)[/i]
[-0]: Creatures you control gain vigilance, indestructible, and “This creature can't be sacrificed” until your next turn.
[-9]: Until your next turn, creatures you control get +5/+5.
rules_text2:
Haste
{T}: Create two 3/2 Nightmare Ally creature tokens with haste that are all colors. Sacrifice Yumeko and those tokens at the beginning of your next end step.
